description: The attributes that describe information specific to storage buckets.
caption: Storage Bucket
name: storage_bucket

bucket_name.description: The name of the storage bucket.

bucket_storage_class.description: The storage class of the bucket, such as Standard, Infrequent Access, or Archive.

bucket_location.description: The geographic location where the bucket is stored.

bucket_versioning.description: Indicates whether versioning is enabled for the bucket.

bucket_encryption.description: Specifies the encryption settings for the bucket, such as server-side encryption.

bucket_access_control.description: The access control policies and permissions applied to the bucket.

bucket_lifecycle_rules.description: The lifecycle management rules for objects in the bucket, such as transition to different storage classes or expiration.

bucket_cors_configuration.description: The Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) configuration for the bucket.
